import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react'; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import {Button, Col, Dropdown, Form, Row} from "react-bootstrap"; import {Context} from "../../index"; const CreateDevice = ({show,onHide}) => { const {device} = useContext(Context) const {info,setInfo} = useState([]) const addInfo = () =>{ setInfo([...info,{title:'',description:'',number:Date.now()}]) } return ( Add new device
Choose your type {device.types.map(type => {type.name} )} Choose your brand {device.brands.map(brand => {brand.name} )}
{ info.map(i => ) }
); }; export default CreateDevice;
